item.description:
Firstly, Gabe beat me :(
Then Larry, the new guy, beat me :(
So I forfeited 3 times (I think it was only 3 times) so as not to lose face any more (or less) :(
Great to have Joe back (who also beat me or I forfeited first) :(
Susan on the other hand beat everyone else, and I think I forfeited on her also :(
Then we have Karen, who yelled at me all night :(
Missed Bette, Emad, Laura, Teresa, Sue, Dave, etc.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with our cribbage boards out :)
item.name: Waltham Cribbage Meet Up - YES, SUMMER WAS HERE ! !
